document_data.mainbody:
he Grand Fist were a group of adventurers who operated circa 1369 DR. They were well-meaning and kind people, but not particularly capable or competent.
In the , the Runners attended a party hosted by Lord Partic Thistle at Thistleflame Keep in Suzail. The occasion was King Azoun Obarskyr IVs birthday, and Lord Thistle hoped to improve the standing of adventuring companies in Cormyr by having them present themselves as a gesture of fealty to the King.
* Jacer Wind-dancer
* Brandy Fumblebuckle
